languages.text: "Лекарства нет. Но эффект я облегчу и ускорю его растворение". {n}В руке Висиря возникает три длинных спицы, а через мгновение они уже оказываются в вашем теле — в шее, в плече, между ребер. Вы не чувствуете боли и дискомфорта, напротив, разум проясняется и мышцы приходят в тонус. Затем старец бережно вынимает иглы.{/n} "Теперь станет лучше".

"There is none. But I will ease its effect and quicken dissipation." {n}Three long, thick needles appear in the Vizsier's hand. A moment later, they are inside your body: one in your neck, one in your shoulder, and one between your ribs. You feel no pain or discomfort. On the contrary, your mind feels clearer and your muscles regain their function. The Vizsier then carefully removes the needles.{/n} "Now you will feel better."
languages.original_text: "Лекарства нет. Но эффект я облегчу и ускорю его растворение". {n}В руке Висиря возникает три длинных спицы, а через мгновение они уже оказываются в вашем теле — в шее, в плече, между ребер. Вы не чувствуете боли и дискомфорта, напротив, разум проясняется и мышцы приходят в тонус. Затем старец бережно вынимает иглы.{/n} "Теперь станет лучше".

traits.locale_text: "There is none. But I will ease its effect and quicken its dissolution." {n}Three long, thick needless appear in the Vizsier's hand. A moment later, they are inside your body: one in your neck, one in your shoulder, and one between your ribs. You feel no pain or discomfort. On the contrary, your mind is cleared and your muscles regain their tone. The old man then carefully removes the needles.{/n} "Now you are going to feel better."

On the contrary, your mind is cleared and your muscles regain their tone. The old man then carefully removes the needles.{/n} "Now you are going to feel better."

On the contrary, your mind feels clearer and your muscles regain their function. The Vizsier then carefully removes the needles.{/n} "Now you will feel better."

languages.text: "Es gibt keines. Doch ich werde die Wirkung abschwächen und dafür sorgen, dass sie schneller verfliegt." {n}Drei lange, dicke Nadeln erscheinen in der Hand des Wesirs. Einen Augenblick später stecken sie schon in deinem Körper: eine im Hals, eine in den Schultern, eine zwischen den Rippen. Du spürst weder Schmerz noch Unbehagen. Im Gegenteil, dein Verstand fühlt sich klarer an, deine Muskeln gewinnen ihre Funktion zurück. Dann zieht der Wesir die Nadeln vorsichtig wieder heraus.{/n} "Nun solltet Ihr Euch besser fühlen."
languages.original_text: "There is none. But I will ease its effect and quicken dissipation." {n}Three long, thick needles appear in the Vizsier's hand. A moment later, they are inside your body: one in your neck, one in your shoulder, and one between your ribs. You feel no pain or discomfort. On the contrary, your mind feels clearer and your muscles regain their function. The Vizsier then carefully removes the needles.{/n} "Now you will feel better."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt keines. Doch ich werde die Wirkung abschwächen und dafür sorgen, dass sie schneller verfliegt." {n}Drei lange, dicke Nadeln erscheinen in der Hand des Wesirs. Einen Augenblick später stecken sie schon in deinem Körper: eine im Hals, eine in den Schultern, eine zwischen den Rippen. Du spürst weder Schmerz noch Unbehagen. Im Gegenteil, dein Verstand fühlt sich klarer an, deine Muskeln gewinnen ihre Funktion zurück. Dann zieht der Wesir die Nadeln vorsichtig wieder heraus.{/n} "Nun solltet Ihr Euch besser fühlen."

languages.text: «No existe ninguno, pero aliviaré sus efectos y aceleraré su disipación». {n}Tres agujas largas y gruesas aparecen en la mano del Visir. Un momento más tarde, se encuentran en tu cuerpo: una en tu cuello, otra en tu hombro y la última entre tus costillas. No sientes el más mínimo dolor ni incomodidad. Al contrario: tu mente se despeja y tus músculos recuperan sus funciones. El Visir te saca las agujas con delicadeza.{/n} «Ahora se encontrará mejor».
languages.original_text: "There is none. But I will ease its effect and quicken dissipation." {n}Three long, thick needles appear in the Vizsier's hand. A moment later, they are inside your body: one in your neck, one in your shoulder, and one between your ribs. You feel no pain or discomfort. On the contrary, your mind feels clearer and your muscles regain their function. The Vizsier then carefully removes the needles.{/n} "Now you will feel better."

traits.locale_text: «No existe ninguno, pero aliviaré sus efectos y aceleraré su disipación». {n}Tes agujas largas y gruesas aparecen en la mano del Visir. Un momento más tarde, se encuentran en tu cuerpo: una en tu cuello, otra en tu hombro y la última entre tus costillas. No sientes el más mínimo dolor ni incomodidad. Al contrario: tu mente se despeja y tus músculos recuperan sus funciones. El Visir te saca las agujas con delicadeza.{/n} «Ahora se encontrará mejor».

languages.text: 「何もない。だが、私は私はその影響をやわらげ、散逸を促している」{n}ヴィジールの手の中に、長く太い針が3本現れる。次の瞬間、3本の針が、あなたの体の中に入っていく。1本が首に、1本が肩に、1本が肋骨の間に。痛みや不快感はない。それどころか、あなたの精神はさらにクリアになり、筋肉がその機能を取り戻す。その後、ヴィジールは慎重に針を抜いた。{/n}「さあ、気分が良くなっただろう」
languages.original_text: "There is none. But I will ease its effect and quicken dissipation." {n}Three long, thick needles appear in the Vizsier's hand. A moment later, they are inside your body: one in your neck, one in your shoulder, and one between your ribs. You feel no pain or discomfort. On the contrary, your mind feels clearer and your muscles regain their function. The Vizsier then carefully removes the needles.{/n} "Now you will feel better."

traits.locale_text: 「何もない。だが、私は私はその影響をやわらげ、散逸を促している」{n}ヴィジールの手の中に、長く太い針が3本現れる。次の瞬間、3本の針が、あなたの体の中に入っていく。1本が首に、1本が肩に、1本が肋骨の間に。痛みや不快感はない。それどころか、あなたの精神はさらにクリアになり、筋肉がその機能を取り戻す。その後、ヴィジールは慎重に針を抜いた。{/n}「さあ、気分が良くなっただろう」

languages.text: “没有解药，但我可以减轻它的影响，让它快速消散。”{n}宿老手中出现了三根又粗又长的尖针，片刻之后，它们便刺入了你的身体。一根针扎在你的脖子上，一根扎在肩膀上，另一根刺入了肋骨之间。你并没有感觉到疼痛或任何不适，相反，你感觉思维变得异常清晰，肌肉也恢复了活力。随后，宿老小心翼翼地取出了尖针。{/n}“您现在应该感觉会好些了。”
languages.original_text: "There is none. But I will ease its effect and quicken dissipation." {n}Three long, thick needles appear in the Vizsier's hand. A moment later, they are inside your body: one in your neck, one in your shoulder, and one between your ribs. You feel no pain or discomfort. On the contrary, your mind feels clearer and your muscles regain their function. The Vizsier then carefully removes the needles.{/n} "Now you will feel better."

traits.locale_text: “没有解药，但我可以减轻它的影响，让它快速消散。”{n}宿老手中出现了三根又粗又长的尖针，片刻之后，它们便刺入了你的身体。一根针扎在你的脖子上，一根扎在肩膀上，另一根刺入了肋骨之间。你并没有感觉到疼痛或任何不适，相反，你感觉思维变得异常清晰，肌肉也恢复了活力。随后，宿老小心翼翼地取出了尖针。{/n}“您现在应该感觉会好些了。”

languages.text: « Il n'y en a pas, mais je vais en atténuer les effets et en accélérer la dissipation. » {n}Trois aiguilles longues et épaisses apparaissent dans la main du vizir. Un instant plus tard, elles sont fichées dans votre corps : la première dans votre cou, la deuxième dans votre épaule et la dernière entre vos côtes. Vous ne ressentez aucune douleur, ni même la moindre sensation d'inconfort. Au contraire, vos pensées vous semblent plus claires et vos muscles recouvrent leur motricité. Au bout d'un moment, le vizir finit par retirer délicatement les aiguilles.{/n} « Vous devriez vous sentir mieux, à présent. »
languages.original_text: "There is none. But I will ease its effect and quicken dissipation." {n}Three long, thick needles appear in the Vizsier's hand. A moment later, they are inside your body: one in your neck, one in your shoulder, and one between your ribs. You feel no pain or discomfort. On the contrary, your mind feels clearer and your muscles regain their function. The Vizsier then carefully removes the needles.{/n} "Now you will feel better."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y en a pas, mais je vais en atténuer les effets et en accélérer la dissipation. » {n}Trois aiguilles longues et épaisses apparaissent dans la main du vizir. Un instant plus tard, elles sont fichées dans votre corps : la première dans votre cou, la deuxième dans votre épaule et la dernière entre vos côtes. Vous ne ressentez aucune douleur, ni même la moindre sensation d'inconfort. Au contraire, vos pensées vous semblent plus claires et vos muscles recouvrent leur motricité. Au bout d'un moment, le vizir finit par retirer délicatement les aiguilles.{/n} « Vous devriez vous sentir mieux, à présent. »

languages.text: "Panzehri bulunmuyor. Ancak ben, etkisini azaltıp hızlıca dağılmasını sağlayacağım." {n}Vezir'in elinde üç uzun ve kalın iğne beliriyor. Bir süre sonra bu iğnelerden biri boynuna, biri omzuna ve biri de kaburgalarının arasına giriyor. Ne acı ne de rahatsızlık hissediyorsun. Aksine zihnin berraklaşıyor ve kasların işlevlerini yeniden kazanıyor. Ardından Vezir, iğneleri dikkatlice çıkarıyor.{/n} "Şimdi daha iyi hissedeceksiniz."
languages.original_text: "There is none. But I will ease its effect and quicken dissipation." {n}Three long, thick needles appear in the Vizsier's hand. A moment later, they are inside your body: one in your neck, one in your shoulder, and one between your ribs. You feel no pain or discomfort. On the contrary, your mind feels clearer and your muscles regain their function. The Vizsier then carefully removes the needles.{/n} "Now you will feel better."
